In the game, Pinky and The Brain set up hidden speakers that induct mind control through eerie sounds to people and make them believe they are always shooting movies, so Brain can turn the Warner Bros. Water Tower into a rocket that would launch a satellite into space that plays loud barking noises to disrupt people of the planet. Yakko, Wakko and Dot, the only three immune to the eerie sounds set off to destroy the hidden speakers.

In the game, the D-Pad was used to direct orders to the player's squad. These commands were: Assault, Barrage, Hold the line, and Form Up. One screen also showed the player giving a squad member the order to stealth kill an enemy soldier.

name: Let's Get Changed! Nyanzou & Kumakichi: Escape Game
description:
Nyanzou is quiet today for a change.
When Kumakichi check up on him, looks like he's reading a magazine.
After a little while, he suddenly gets a move on.
Nyanzou is notorious for not stopping until he gets what he wants.
Kumakichi gets caught up in Nyanzou's plans, and before he knew it, they're off to a boutique.
What in the world are these two up two?

name: Planet Quiz: Complete Edition
description:
Planet Quiz is a charming way to expand your knowledge about Earth, animals, culture… and a guaranteed fun time for you and your friends.

With this Complete Bundle you will get:
- All the content available in the main title.
- Additional content introducing questions about oceans, reefs, and islands.
- 1000+ entries in Quizpedia knowledge base.
- 3 gameplay modes (single player campaign, quiz play, and 2-4 players tournament).
- Questions with different levels of difficulty (easy, medium, and hard).

name: Decisive Strike
description: A sci-fi team-based Third Person Shooter where strategy is as important as your reflexes.

name: Super Space Galaxy
description: Go anywhere you want in a Galaxy full of wonders! Making a fortune, exploring strange new worlds, and protecting the Galaxy from demonic cultists is all in a day's work for a space-adventurer.

name: Space Marmalade
description: Space Marmalade is a sci-fi turn-based strategy genre, bending the geometry of grid-space for an interstellar environment. Move from star to star, dispatching waves of procedurally-generated enemies. Each level is its own Solar System, with planets and asteroids to hide behind.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Ghoulish Games
description: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Haunted Carnival themed tables with an emphasis on bouncy playfields, unique flipper setups, teleporting balls & Multi-ball madness!

name: Death Dungeon
description: "Death dungeon" is a strategic barrage shooting game. You need to reasonably select and use dual weapons and dual skills to fight the randomly generated enemies in the dungeon and kill all the enemies in the room with the least loss of life.

name: D.M.D Ping Pong Game
description: Play ping pong as the talented wrestler/dentist Brit Baker!

name: Legendary Knight
description: This is the adventure of a legendary knight, returning home to find his town looted and all the inhabitants of a peaceful town kidnapped. It's up to you to free all the inhabitants, fighting monsters and bosses. Go through mazes, caves, and castles, upgrade your weapons, and buy potions.

name: The Neighborhood
description: The Neighborhood is a humorous simulator of life in a small town. The player has the opportunity to direct the fate of a new member of this local community. He will get to know local neighbors and unique stories, he will take part in various exciting and often funny events.

name: Bad Cops
description: A tactical SWAT simulator to be played solo or with friends/other Steam players. Are you a good cop or a bad cop?

name: Terraforming Mars: Hellas & Elysium
description: Explore a new side of Mars with the new Hellas & Elysium maps, each bringing a new set of twists, awards and milestones. From the Southern Wilds to the Other Face of Mars, the taming of the Red Planet continues.

name: Predator: Hunting Grounds - Emissary Predator
description: Strike fear into your foes as the calculated new Emissary Predator. This DLC pack includes the Emissary Predator premium class.

name: Bike Mechanic Simulator 2023
description: Repair, service and build bikes. Become a bicycle mechanic and make your workshop a real empire on two wheels. Show off your precision and put equipment to a test. From city bikes to high-performance road and MTB models. It's time for cycling madness!

name: Surviving Mars: Martian Express
description: Trains are here! With the Martian Express pack you’ll finally be able to move your colonists and resources between stations facilitating access to far away domes and remote resource deposits. Other outside manned buildings will also be buildable near stations without needing a dome.

name: Samurai
description: Samurai is a tricky and tactical turn-based adventure. Take on the Yokai fortress one area at a time and face increasingly challenging foes in beautiful low-poly Japanese themed environments.

name: The Remains: Chapter 1
description: In this linear story driven horror game you have the daunting task to find out what has happend to the asylum of Piekielna Wioska, a "special research facility". Your mission is simple: get you and your target out of there. Happy hunting.

name: Train Simulator: Bahnstrecke Leipzig - Riesa Route
description: Hurry along Germany’s oldest long-distance railway in its entirety, from the densely packed city of Leipzig, and out far east via Wurzen and Riesa into historical Dresden with Train Simulator’s Bahnstrecke Leipzig - Riesa Route Extension!

name: Train Simulator: Glasgow Subway Route
description: Go round and round under the heart of Scotland’s most populous city with Thomson Interactive’s authentic rendition of the Glasgow Subway in Train Simulator!

name: Dust: A Post Apocalyptic Role Playing Game
description: A post apocalyptic survival game with randomly generated events, that will challenge your decision making. It is inspired by classic games such as: Fallout and Wasteland series. Every decision you make in the game has consequences that can result in success or death, both in short term or long term.

name: Prison of the Mind
description: I ... this is me. Everything starts with you and ends with you. This is a plan that you have to design in your mind It was true that I was released, but not from myself. There is still a prisoner inside me ... a prisoner that no one sees from the outside, but you continue to suffer, you suffer,

name: Fallen Worlds
description: Fallen worlds is a fast-paced Action-RPG Roguelite Hack & Slash. Play single-player or up to 4-player online co-op in procedurally generated maps.

name: Walk Hero
description: Go forward. Kill enemies. Collect loot. Get stronger. And again. An unusual mix of genres will allow you to focus solely on the choice of equipment and upgrades.

name: Industrial Trouble
description: Industrial trouble - In this adventure platformer, you take on the role of a mysterious wanderer who travels between worlds, trying to find a portal to his dimension.

name: TumbleWeed
description: An inventive merge of classic tower defense and roguelike looting. Towers are loot! Tower enhancements are loot! Consumables are loot! Adapt and use your resources wisely to make it to the end!

name: Neon Speed
description: Neon Speed is a casual racing game.You need to ride on a high speed between another cars on the road and earn points to improve your car later.You can choose the best car that will absolutely fits you!

name: Arobynn: The First Adventure
description: Shoot 'Em Up Collector with body tracking and an assortment of guns. Wander through levels of progressing size & difficulty while defending yourself from the AI that inhabit the desolate Geocubic Wastes.

name: Dandelion
description: Dandelion is a psychological horror adventure game focused on exploration. Navigate through a cute town, get to know others, even if the world you live in doesn't make sense

name: Catch the Yeti!
description: Catch the Yeti! is a puzzle game set in a snowy forest where you try to catch, the yeti! Your goal is to corner the yeti by shaking snow off the trees.

name: OctoMaze
description: Priceless artifacts were stolen long ago from octopus tribe by their eternal rivals – disgusting parasites. These parasites infested the entire realm since then. To stop parasites from spreading and save the tribe, artifacts have to be returned, or everything is lost.

name: Hypnosis Reveries
description: Based on interdisciplinary research in VR, HYPNOSIS REVERIES takes an abstract and minimalist approach to tell a story about growing. Through a 20-minute experience, you will step into a mental maze, looking back at the important moments that changed you, and see yourself again.

name: Spellers
description: Step into the arena to take on other wizards in this magical brawl. Choose from a variety of spells with which to decimate your opponents in this multiplayer magic fight. Work together with your team to defeat your opponents and win the match. Do you have what it takes to be the best spell caster?

name: Dragon Sleuth Brittany
description: Dragon Sleuth Brittany showcases high quality pixel art combined with a cool soundtrack, voiced dialogue and filled to the brim with lewd jokes, sex scenes and lewd mini games.

name: Penguin Adventure
description: Penguin Adventure is an action adventure game, the game screen is very gorgeous, the game set up a rich game levels, players need to control the penguin forward to eat the stars and fruit, eliminate monsters, avoid obstacles, the game play is very thrilling.

name: Couple Last Conductors
description: A co-op roguelite experience set in an apocalyptic world, where cooperation with your partner is the key to continued survival.

name: Terra Puzzle 3D
description: Assemble the planet Earth as a spherical jigsaw puzzle in full 3D and at 3 levels of difficulty.

name: Zombie Slaughter VR
description: The world is in danger. Make your way to the evacuation center, take part in the great battle for survival, and discover the cause of the invade!

name: Bomber Boom
description: Bomber Boom is a multiplayer game It is played between 2 - 4 players in an arena on which player it is, this player beats by placing bombs and it is played in 3 rounds The last one left in the arena wins the first round the first to accumulate three rounds in a row wins the game

name: Heroes Rally
description: "Heroes Rally" is a casual strategy tower defense game. By building defense towers with different characteristics, casting spells, and commanding heroes to repel all enemies who will commit crimes in the future!

name: Rhythmic Keyboard
description: Rhythmic Keyboard is a music-based typing game with integration of a talent system that allows for the player to increase their effectiveness. Procedurally spawned keys inhibit pattern formation, so reaction speed and hand/eye coordination are a priority -- not memorization.

name: Caution
description: Caution is a platform game about a caution sign that performs its function masterfully, until a garbageman hijacks it and puts it in a garbage truck. The sign, which in turn, has sworn revenge against the nefarious garbageman.

name: Spell Welders
description: Play as 1 of 17 different welders in this strategic turn-based RPG! After you choose your spell, decide how you will cast it. Will it be fast? Accurate? Powerful? You've never had control like this before as you weld your way to victory!

name: Bloodied Fear
description: Poor Joe. His wife left him and his son was killed in a tragic accident. Now he's been tasked with rescuing the King's daughter. Unfortunately for the bad guys, Joe's in a really pissed off mood.

name: The Medical Examination Diary: The Exciting Days of Me and My Senpai
description: Would you like to start the love romance by your senpai that you desired? "The medical examination diary: the exciting days of me and my senpai" is the novel game.

name: Guardians: Agents of Justice
description: Guardians: Agents of Justice is a cancelled superhero squad tactics game developed in 1996/1997. The game was supposed to play like X-Com, but with superheroes.

name: Escape Dark Tunnels
description: Escape Dark Tunnels is a puzzle game where the player gets trapped underground being chased by mysterious creatures. You will have to use your ingenuity and logic to escape from the tunnels.

name: Per Aspera: Blue Mars
description: The Blue Mars DLC introduces players to new, ocean-size bodies of water and all the benefits that come with them! You've changed the face of the Red Planet with the Green Mars update - now let's go for blue!

name: Moros Protocol
description: Your mission is not just to survive, but to face yourself, your past and prepare for "a world full of darkness and monsters". A stylized pixel painted FPS roguelike game, that combines the feel of early action-adventure games, with innovative mechanics.

name: Liberty Castle: Home of the Free
description: As The success of Freedom Castle hinges on the strength of the community, our focus will always be centered around creating a positive environment for attracting original thought. Our intent is to bring out peoples innate desires for open discussion and immersive social experience.

name: The Unsettled
description: The Unsettled is a first-person Psychological Horror game. You as an Investigative Journalist, Got Intel about a Missing girl in a Boarding School, but it reveals something more Evil and Scary.

name: Change: A Homeless Survival Experience - Living City Expansion
description: Create your own story and explore all the new buildings, items, perks and characters in this huge expansion for Change: A Homeless Survival Experience.

name: Space City: Build Your Empire
description: A sci-fi turn-based strategy that will make you immerse yourself in a new world.

name: Closer Than You Know
description: A cozy, modern spin on the old point-and-click adventure games. Packed with story and puzzles, this adventure centers around young Sam. She's on a big quest to save her home planet--where Hope has been outlawed.

name: The Heroic Legend of Eagarlnia: Expansion Pack
description: The DLC of include four new forces, Yan and Kaze，Ikaris and Herricido.

name: Twisted Draw
description: Twisted Draw is a card based strategy game set in a medieval realm where the Necromancer threatens to wipe out life as we know it. Collect and command powerful units and spells to keep the hordes of undead at bay.

name: Roburst
description: Roburst is a multiplayer competitive VR game. Create your own remote control robot and fight to become the best Roburst Figther!

name: Major League
description: After Timur and Roger are fired from the bank, they decide to work for Krusslin. They have to choose between the stock market ambitions of the mafia and gangs and their own reality.

name: Into the Dark
description: Action-Oriented Dungeon Crawler RPG

name: La Vie La Rue
description: Cartoonish 2d game made by two brothers. Unique art all around these wonderful locations. Try and go to the furthest possible to beat your highscore and maybe be the first one to reach the end.

name: Rich Lady's Slave Role Play
description: I reluctantly agreed to accommodate my difficult supervisor from the company I had worked before, but in return, she started to “play slave” as her payment, calling me “master” and occasionally stripping me of my clothes and putting her hands on me! What the hell was going on?!!!

name: Dominus Rage
description: Beat 'Em Up is a game in traditions of the old masters. Fight alone or with a company and beat up all your foes. Dominus feels that the Tavor has come back to life again. He returns to Altran, where his enimies are waiting for him.

name: Cartographer
description: Cartographer is a turn-based game, where you decide how the world map looks. Build the map to build the world! The combat system is very simple and each enemy has its own attack pattern, which you can learn and exploit to defeat them in glorious turn-based battle!

name: Galactic Gym: Fitness Center Management
description: Can you run the galaxy’s greatest gym? Step into the shoes of a gym manager and fulfill the exercise dreams of your intergalactic customers! With equipment for numerous disciplines, varied exercise environments, and many employees to hire, you can create the best gym on this side of the Milky Way!

name: Coloring Game 4: Steampunk

name: Warmonger: Sins of the Naga

name: Tiltfire

name: Fruit Farmer
description: Build your incredible farm! Create upgrades, get resources, create new types of fruits, sell what you have collected or create products from it! Explore an open world with lots of puzzles! Be the best farmer!

name: Bound in Time
description: A heroic journey through time making friends along the way. Starting in the 1990s and launching yourself into the past and future. Full of nostalgic trips backwards and hopeful tomorrows. A love letter to the best JRPGs from the SNES era.

name: Escape From Zombie U: Reloaded
description: If you thought the school system has reached its lowest levels... Think again!

name: Power (of) Metal
description: Power (of) Metal is a 2D hack/slash platformer, journey of Maleqqi who want to fulfill his emptiness inside of him and he will find the Power (of) Metal

name: Aquarium Designer: Sea Life
description: Let the marine life thrive and create a wonderful undersea kingdom using saltwater fish, seashells, and corals. Accept new challenges and build fishtastic aquatic landscapes.

name: Astroworld
description: Astroworld is a side-scrolling co-op game where the players will have to build their colony on a planet full of danger, valuable resources and alien artifacts, using which the player can explore new technologies and equipment to arm their colonists with.

name: Repulsor
description: Repulsor is a challenging 360° Retro Arcade Shoot 'em Up featuring a color-switching gameplay mechanic.

name: Paranormal Simulator
description: As a paranormal investigator, your job is to discover the magical properties of anomalous items and find creative ways to use them against supernatural creatures. Without accidentally being abducted by a dark entity or suffering a bizarre anomalous effect, of course!

name: Otherworld Legends: Hannah
description: Sin descripción

name: The Old Forest
description: The Old Forest is an open world RPG with dungeon crawling, exploration, crafting, survival mechanics and loot! Slash, sneak or cast your way through the ominous forest, catacombs, ruins, caves and dungeons to uncover why the forest spirits are angry and how to bring an end to the endless winter.

name: Dash and Slash
description: Slash and Dash through your enemies in this pixel-art, one-button, hack and slash! Cut through the city, break into its' heart and descend to its' depths.

name: BrVR: Backrooms Virtual Reality
description: BrVR: Backrooms VR is a virtual reality survival horror game inspired by The Backrooms. The Backrooms are out of the boundaries of the real world and can only be accessed by no-clipping through a floor or wall in a place that inspires deja vu or an uncomfortable feeling of nostalgia.

name: Solitaire: Beautiful Garden Season
description: Garden season, whenever you want! "Solitaire Beautiful Garden Season offers hours of challenging gameplay.

name: Monster Energy Supercross 5: The Official Videogame - Legends Pack Vol. 2
description: Race back in time and compete with the champions of the past with the Legends Pack Vol. 2!

name: Impulse Rogue
description: Impulse Rogue is a punishing souls-like action RPG. Master combat, face relentless enemies, venture fractured mind, explore twisted landscapes, unravel forgotten mysteries, confront lurking demons. Will you succumb to darkness, or emerge victorious? a pure soul's fate hangs in the balance.

name: Ferrum inc
description: Become an operator who controls a robot of Ferrum inc. Participate in 5-by-5 battles where you can choose your fighting machine and use a unique camera control system. Time to spill the oil!

name: Deck Adventurers: Heroes of the Valley
description: Save the Valley from the hordes of monsters that ravage it in this turn-based tactical combat and deck-building RPG game.

name: Chroma + Elektron
description: Chroma + Elektron is a 2D twin-stick shooter. Return all chromatic energy back to its proper state. Survive against increasingly difficult waves of constructs and collect their energy to unleash powerful weapons and abilities. Your speed and power will know no equal.

name: Grow the Hell up by Dusty Lane
description: Grow The Hell Up by Dusty Lane is an absurd adventure VR game. Solve unique physics puzzles, decipher codes, find hidden items... and try your best to act like an adult.

name: Nightmare: The Origins - Curse of Night
description: A single-player story, dive into the paranormal

name: Gardenia VR
description: A laid-back combination of a gardening simulator and a fairy tale adventure. Help Wood Grandpa clean the island and restore its beauty so that its former inhabitants can return to their homes. Take photos of your garden compositions, relax and discover the secrets.

name: My Student Loves Me!
description: A short visual novel VR for adults where the story and play changes depending on your choices! You can become a tutor and fall in love with your student. Your student loves you and confesses her love to you. Let's make out as much as you want!

name: Tales of Inca 2: New Adventures
description: Join the Incas on their exciting journey, fight against demons and mystical monsters and experience exciting adventures!

name: Prism: A Visual Novel
description: On her way to the city of opportunity, a young Freyja is trapped when a sudden fog descends upon the town known as Avon-On-Reach. Soon, she starts to wonder if there's more to the fog than meets the eye, and if it has a connection to the strange monstrous happenings around the town.

name: One Way Trip
description: Stealth will be your only defense in this 1-4 player Sci-fi horror scenario while you attempt to escape an ever learning AI. Be quite, stay hidden, and remain calm, or face certain death.

name: Moonphase Pass
description: A rougelite meeple placement game. Help Lili as she fights back against the Red Moon to protect her forest hut!

name: Covid Carl
description: Covid Carl is a Metroidvania/Contra-style 2d side-scrolling shooter. It will feature a brief story, 10 levels, and boss fights

name: Glorious Day to Die
description: Hardcore shooter where you will have to repel the attacks of the alien monsters using the various weapons and a dog, which can sniff invisible enemies.

name: Fire the Zombies
description: This is a Guard Game, you can control the gun o fire,There are multiple styles of zombies and bosses need you to destroy. Different weapons have different powers, come and experience it.

name: Dungeoneer
description: Dungeoneer is a top-down action RPG with auto-attack style combat where you progress by exploring and completing dungeons. Choose from up to 6 classes and 6 skills to create your custom hero. Play solo or with up to 4 players.

name: The Farmer's Story of Slow Life
description: The sisters inherited the ranch and the mountains from their father's estate. But the island is no longer vibrant. You set out to rebuild the ranch and the town. When you have gathered enough assets, you can visit remote islands far away. You will surely find unknown items waiting for you.

name: Gates of Nesphera
description: Cepheus Gate VR is a roguelite inspired dungeon crawler. Explore vast corridors, fight against powerful Keepers and use deadly power of Nebula to grow in strength. Be careful though, the mighty power is treacherous and can devour you if not used wisely.

name: The Airline Project: Next Gen
description: Set up a widespread network and gain as much market share as possible in the era of your choice using your favorite aircraft in this offline airline tycoon. Do you have what it takes to coordinate an airline?

name: Red Flowers
description: A lightning-fast action platformer in which the enemy always outnumbers you, and the cost of a mistake is death. Slice your way through the dystopian stone jungle with a transformer katana, shredding heavily armed opponents in a stylish super-fast manner.

name: Light Bringer
description: Light Bringer is a 2D side scrolling fantasy strategy game with development elements. Explore, gather, build and then when night falls, survive! All in the style of beautiful hand-painted graphics. Will you bring the light?

name: Taiga
description: Taiga is an atmospheric first person horror game with elements of survival. Explore the maze like forest, Uncover dark secrets that lay beneath pine and spruce. Save your colleagues if you can, but most importantly. Escape with your life.

name: Cowardice
description: This is a horror and decryption game. The style is 2D pixel cartoon. There are five chapters to explore. Each chapter has new maps and music. There are three enemies. They all have two stages and six chasing music. They need to constantly avoid the pursuit of the enemy until the end

name: Atelier Sophie 2: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Dream - Extra Area: Atelier Plachta
description: Plachta as the main character! An additional story episode with young Plachta as the main character, set in the time after she arrived in Erde Wiege and before she first met Sophie. Players will play as Plachta, with Diebold and Ramizel available as party members.

name: Heroes of Book & Paper
description: HB&P s an old-school RPG game that uses an 80s/90s style of design and concept. Your decisions will determine the ending of each adventure you take. Every story has different and random components. This means that the stories will vary from game to game.

name: All Songs are From the King
description: A game where Silent Hills meets Kahlil Gibran’s ‘The Prophet’.

name: Spell Welders
description: Sin descripción

name: Fists of Invokers
description: Fight online with friends and strangers in different stages and become the last one standing.

name: Hotel Manager Simulator
description: You have been hired as a hotel manager. Now it is the time to prove yourself that you can bring benefits to the hotel while keeping hotel customers happy as much as possible by satisfying their appropriate needs. Good luck, fellows!

name: Black Ink
description: A hand-drawn action video game about love, weapons, comedy, more weapons, penguins, a2 + b2 = c2, and lots of weapons!

name: The Neroe
description: Action-adventure roguelike game in which you can catch and control creatures. Explore the open world, find the secrets, get items and complete the dungeons. Play solo or local multiplayer: each player makes his own adventure!

name: Universe Apart
description: Universe Apart is a twin-stick 2d horror space exploration shooter with rogue-like elements. Venture out and fight your way through space ships, mining stations and asteroids to scavenge weapons, resources, duct tape and new crew mates: Find a planet and seed it - or die trying.

name: Duline
description: A simple yet challenging geometric puzzle game

name: River Rush
description: River Rush is reminiscent of old vertically scrolling shoot’em up games. Remember them ? It is time to catch up with nostalgia. Make your youth experience alive again! OR here is a chance to catch up with your father's nostalgia. Take a chance and see what are we talking about!

name: Last Day: Zombie Survival VR
description: A stranger, who awakens in a room with no recollection of how they got there, soon discovers they're pawns in a deadly game perpetrated by a notorious unknown person.

name: The Dark Heart of Balor
description: Archdemon Balor has opened the Gate of Hell into the human realm and hordes of demons and monsters have flooded into your world destroying everything in their path. You must protect those who are still alive and ultimately destroy Balor to close the Gate.

name: Space Egg Shooter
description: Space Egg Shooter: Inspired by classic arcade games, sidescroller shooter invites you to plunge into the thick of space battles!

name: Dino-D
description: The game is well suited for children, it develops logical thinking and reaction, even playing solo, controlling 2 heroes at the same time develops the brain and forms new neural connections.

name: Cold Engines
description: Cold Engines is an RTS where you need to survive in a harsh frost environment and defeat your enemy. Build a warm base for your people where they refuel their tanks, steal frozen or damaged wrecks and pull them to your base, ambush and attack while using the freezing world as your advantage.

name: Rgby
description: Rgby is 4 players local multiplayer Co-op game. Run around on screen and dodge bullets. Destroy your enemies with friends!

name: Forest Grump
description: The cheesy space schnitzel, monsters and guns, old smackdonald, freaky forest, killing friends, or the first day in forestry. Name it whatever you want, the ultimate action-packed FPS/CTF/RPG is here. Plus, this game is funny as hell. Start playing today!

name: Game of Seven
description: Game of Seven is an original two-player turn-based board game that revolves around the number 7. In this game you will command seven angels that move in patterns of the number 7, on a seven by seven board.

name: Bullet Quest
description: Defend against waves of ever increasing enemies by harvesting resources then building up a base and your defenses. Takes place in a bleak mechanical dystopia were the factory reigns supreme.

name: Boating Simulator 2022
description: You would think that the day would never come where a simulator game could make you want to go out and buy a boat, or better yet actually take up boating as a hobby, you were wrong. ~Joystick compatible~

name: Age of Discovery
description: A top down 2D fantasy game

name: Tower of Cards
description: Tower of Cards is a card based PvP and PvE tower defense game.

name: Arkell
description: Adventurer! Oh, how glad am I to see you here. Our world is destroyed, captivated by the Demon Lord Agatheus. You must help us, angel from the heavens. You must stop Agatheus, or we may never breathe again...

name: Master of War: Rule of Power
description: Dynamic turn-based strategy game inspired by the hyper hardcore genre, where the player as a chief man of his tribe, will lead it to the glory, watch out for food and lurking predators!

name: Wika Wicked's Egg
description: Dare to be Queen Wika's courier in Wika Wicked's Egg; the most dangerous side-scrolling platform adventure in all the fairy lands. Can you, the mere fairykin sprite Lil' Sebastien, bring her this precious, fragile egg before the forces of darkness overwhelm the land & seal her kingdom forever?

name: BlackSky
description: Travel from one solar system to the other in this space action puzzle game. Match tiles to fire your ship's deadly weapons at a multitude of monsters. Upgrade your ship and its weapons to fight stronger enemies

name: Technobog
description: Hack and slash through the web of the corporate network in this merciless fast-paced 3D roguelite that blends freedom of movement and creative combat.

name: Project Apax
description: Join Laia and Evan, two young graduated Apprentices from the Kingdom of Agni, in their adventure to face the powerful Kingdom of Gea. The echoes of a dark past return to threaten all we know, unless the prophecy of the Anointed comes true.

name: Bounda
description: A 2D physics game. In the game，you will control a red panda or cat to defeat cunning greedy enemies, and protect kind animals and beautiful nature, by press release and drap mouse. Press left button of mouse or "P" key to pause game.

name: Dark Hyrule Fantasy
description:
Dark Hyrule Fantasy is a mod for The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time with the goal of telling a new story, in which a new threat emerges in Hyrule, plaguing the survival of all that lives. As this threat emerges, a light will shine bright in darkness.

Development on the mod was cancelled and the game started being reworked into a new original game called "Dark Haven Fantasy" using the Godot engine.

name: Unreal Engine The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
description: A fan recreation of The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time with updated graphics, made using the Unreal Engine.

name: Lumote: The Mastermote Chronicles - Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: AI War 2: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: X4 2022 Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Dash Around Madly
description: Dash Around Madly is a casual game with rogue-lite elements. In the game you will incarnate as a beautiful warrior, control the chess pieces on the board to fight! Mow thousands of enemies until dawn.

name: Hyperbase
description: You find yourself in a mysterious alien base from which no one has ever escaped. Explore the base's perilous inner labyrinths to uncover ancient secrets, escape from this hellish trap, and warn humanity of the impending danger.

name: Defensive Measures
description: Defensive Measures is a FPS/Tower Defense Hybrid game. Deal with your enemies first hand or let your turrets do the talking while you sit back and enjoy the show.

name: Menace Labs
description: In Menace Labs you control a clone who must achieve a target determined by the lab upon its creation so it can live the remainder of its days freely.

name: Bluem
description: The story of 1 robot and 1 cat

name: Skyscraper Jump
description: Help the little cube fulfill his dream and jump to the Limit.

name: Beer Break
description: Very Challenging Medieval themed match 3 game. 400 levels for experienced users who wants the challenge of match 3 games with no help or purchases. The best players might beat all 400 levels.

name: Skellies Ain't Scary
description: Skellies Ain't Scary is a bullet hell rogue-like with minimalist graphics. Delve into dungeons, collect guns and items. Build the strongest synergies and beat all the bosses. Uncover the secrets of the dungeon and collect the lost treasures that await you.

name: Egg Bunny 2
description: You are the Egg bunny which are given tasks by the bunny king to go and collect the eggs that are scattered over the forest. Explore the forest and collect the eggs, return the eggs to the king for a reward.

name: Corridor Sigma
description: 90's-style first-person shooter set in a large alien base filled with angry monsters.

name: Insanity Ice
description: You are an ordinary employee of a research laboratory. One of your workdays becomes a horror. Suddenly a nightmare happens and now you have to survive and figure out what's going on here...

name: Farm Under Fire
description: Farm Under Fire is an online multiplayer 3rd person shooter, with old-school vibe and heavy metal music running in the background! The Devil has come down to Earth to begin mighty FARMING! He possessed the pigs, and now they wreck havoc around the world!

name: IMA Miner
description: Casual 2D mining game.

name: Phil
description: Phil is a 2D roguelike game. Play as an office worker who gets abducted to compete on a saddistic intergalactic TV show, where they're forced to fight their way past a bunch of ridiculous enemies, using a selection of even more ridiclous weapons.

name: Super Asqr
description: Super Asqr is all about a square, trapped in a collection of mazes and requires your precise maneuver ability to avoid obstacles and deadly hazards, such as red walls, moving orange blocks, lasers, mines and many more.

name: Your Personal Chill Apartment
description: Your Personal Chill Apartment is a relaxing music indie game with designing and customizing your personal apartment elements.

name: Chicken in the Henhouse
description: Chicken in the Henhouse is a multiplayer hide-and-seek game in which you kill each other amongst tons of identical looking NPCs. Key to winning is to Walk and Turn like an NPC.

name: NecroArcher
description: Run & gun action arrow shooting game with precise platforming. Game with retro style graphic and modern gameplay. You can upgrade your archer with special items and new weapons available on the map and in stores.

name: End of Despair
description: End of Despair is a pixel action game with rogue-like elements about a man who is tired of routine and self-flagellation. Talk to other people, find all the secrets, defeat the bosses in randomly generated locations.

name: Kokoro Ultimate
description: Defeat Ryzon and tame your inner beast in this hybrid 3D Fighter. Transform into a secondary fighter or activate a unique weapon to extend combos.

name: Groven
description: Live as an aspiring blacksmith that wants to earn his fortune through his craft in this blacksmith RPG. Accept jobs from the village bulletin, gather materials in underground expeditions with your uncle and earn, earn, earn! Rise to become the greatest (and wealthiest) smith in all the kingdom!

name: 42 Ways to Die in Space
description: Survive in space by dodging strange obstacles in an ever-changing gauntlet and reach the end to defeat entropy. Fly with limited resources, get stronger with upgrades and make the right decisions in this action arena rogue-lite. Warning: there is only 1 way to live but 42 ways to die in space...

name: Legend of Rome: The Wrath of Mars
description: Experience a challenging match 3 game and help the Roman people appease Mars, the god of war! Build and restore the proud city to its original splendor.

name: Devexus
description: An unsettling descent down the demoniacal pages of the occult tome, the Sacramentum Devexus.

name: Fall in the Rift
description: In a post-apocalyptic world, explore the Rift to recover Riftium, a mineral with supernatural properties that can save the world. Nevertheless, the adventure is far from being without danger and you will have to fight to survive in this turn-based strategic roguelite!

name: Rogue Warlords
description: Combine RTS combat with roguelike to create highly replayable and strategic action. Summon troops and purchase stacking upgrades to create a massive army of incredibly powerful troops. Can you reign supreme as the all-powerful warlord of the island?

name: Blood Souls
description: Immerse yourself in the world of hardcore RPG, playing as the undead. Use a variety of weapons, rune system and building to go through a path. You will meet various obstacles, unique enemies and many bosses! Control the territory, use all your powers and go through the story, finding out the truth.

name: The Supermarket Hunter
description: Flex, buy everything, buy more and buy!

name: Spy Robot: Gateways to Humanity
description: Single player action FPS game with hacking, stealth and flight elements in a procedurally generated cyberpunk world with VR support. You are the Spy Robot flying on your trusty hover bike to rescue the remains of the human race scattered throughout the galaxy and solve an ancient mystery.

name: Golf a Guy!
description: You are a Human Golf Ball! Launch into the sky! Impact the dirt! Watch as your limbs Flop around like wet noodles! Smash into the $Cash$ to WIN! Collect Eggplants! Will you.. Golf a Guy!?

name: Derpy God
description: Derpy God is a 2D side-scrolling real-time strategy game, with chaotic physics-driven battles, set in a fantasy world of gods and mortals. Gather resources, build defenses and send forth your armies in campaign mode, or get creative and craft crazy scenarios in the sandbox.

name: Caver
description: Explore the vast underground world of Caver! Mine, craft, build, farm with up to 8 friends in this compelling action-packed adventure.

name: Puzzle Mino
description: Puzzle Mino is a minimalist puzzle game. As a puzzle solver, you need to use the blocks to fill in the empty parts of the puzzle panel. With this core gameplay, I has designed about 10 unique mechanisms and a total of about 100 hand-crafted puzzles.

name: Orbit VR
description: Blast your way through the universe in epic battles full of insane destruction.

name: Tear of Titans
description: Tear of Titans is a singleplayer third person shooter bullet hell. Dodge complex bullet patterns through precision movement, dashing, and jumping to avoid an onslaught of enemy attacks. Defeat the Titans in this science fantasy boss rush adventure.

name: Dust Remains
description: Diverse boss rush: from intelligent beings to brutal beasts. Use systemic mechanics and varied tactics to beat each boss. If you fail, you may be captured, maimed, robbed, or set back. But learn from your failure and you will never die. Chip away at the behemoths before you until only dust remains.

name: Squid Prison
description: It seems that the exit is already close... but all the time you find yourself in the same room with new riddles, losing hope that you can get out of here.

name: Aznak
description: Ivan Abel, a young village boy who's mother was abducted by a mad king and his knights. Gathering companions at different locations to create our cast of party members he is able to experience all different types of regions and cultures. Can they save his mother and the world?

name: Timeways
description: Timeways is a narrative-driven adventure game that aims to tell the story of astronaut John and his journey of self-discovery. But imagine if those connections are suddenly interrupted. That's what Timeways is about: How isolation can be a great opportunity for self-discovery.

name: Cleromancy
description: Cleromancy is a turn based combat roguelite in which fate is decided by dice rolls akin to traditionnal TTRPGs. Build your pouch by collecting dice sporting various materials, inks and special effects and lead your heroes to victory !

name: Paracreat
description: A parallel universe with monsters you can tame!

name: Mount Wingsuit 2
description: Are you ready to up your wingsuit game to the next level? Mount Wingsuit 2 has everything that made the original great, plus all it needs to be the definitive wingsuit VR app. There is a whole new mountain, new game modes and a vast, open world.

name: Secret of the Vikings: Mystery island
description: After a severe storm a group of Vikings and the brave Finnja strand on a strange island and face unknown challenges and dangers.

name: Kapital13
description: Kapital 13 is a fun casual strategy game. The game is about you owning your own company. You have to manage all the actions of the workers and yourself. Managing your inventory is also really essential. One of the many features is investing your money and many others.

name: Phobias: Memories of the Past
description: Phobias: Memories of the Past a horror game focused on Phobias, you are a man living your nightmares of past memories, are you ready to play? But tell me, what is your phobia? You are in a place where you have to go through the doors to save yourself from death, you are not alone...

name: Scapegoat
description: Scapegoat is a fun rogue-lite, top-down, 2D, shooter game with cartoon and beautiful hand-drawn scenery. Fight multiple enemy animals, choosing and mastering an increasing variety of weapons to advance through the levels. Designed for both Keyboard/mouse or Gamepad controllers!

name: Art Mahjong 4
description: Excellent entertainment awaits you in this latest version of the popular "Art Mahjong" series. The game offers many challenging levels and mahjongg boards that, once unlocked, reveal beautiful backgrounds.

name: World of Music Interactive Simulator
description: Find and collect over 50 fully-playable musical instruments scattered throughout the World of Music! In this musical platformer sandbox, use your ears to solve puzzles and clamber to places heretofore undiscovered.

name: Koko: The Last Leaf
description: Delve into a mysterious world of Gods and magic as the last of the leaf kind. Fight epic battles for revenge against evil forces. Explore fantastical lands inhabited with magical creatures and peculiar allies. Search for the realm of the Gods and stop them from making a grave mistake.

name: Fireflies
description: Follow the storyline of Helen while she struggles to save her family from an evil witch and free her family. Helen will use her acrobatics and try to use her tiny size in order to reach locations but be very careful as spiders are lurking about looking for a quick tiny meal!

name: Net Knight
description: Delete MalWare, collect cards, customize your digital hero, and explore an infinite procedural world based on the "real" net. Inspired by the Battle Network series, experience an Action-RPG offering a unique story, colorful characters, grid-based combat, and an infinite digital world to explore!

name: Paths of the Sentinels
description: Paths of the Sentinels is an Action Roguelike with Dungeon Crawler elements. Play as a lone warrior who is seeking to destroy the evil that lurks within the castle. Defeat all enemies that lie within the ever-changing Domains of the Sentinels.

name: Wormhole Adventurer
description: Explore the wormhole network, defeat the hostiles, mine and craft to rebuild your space station. customize your ship to your playstyle

name: Barkhan
description: A harsh desert planet has become the stage for a brutal war between three Great Clans. A clash for control over the rare minerals scattered across the planet's surface to prove their superiority. In the heat of dynamic battles with the enemy's troops, be prepared to face and defeat the fearsome creatures hidden beneath the sands.

name: Undead Under Night Rain
description: Place your guitarist to attract zombie hordes and shoot them with your soldiers in a perfect mix of modernized tower defense and challenging strategic gameplay. Each soldier is unique with his own ability and upgrade panel to fight a large amount of undead.

name: Drunken Nuke'em
description: Drunken Nuke'em is a different asymmetric multiplayer horror and humor game. One player (hunter) must kill the rest. The other members (the drunkards) must find a balance between collaboration and betrayal to survive since only one or two will be able to do so.

name: Hypnagonia
description: You realize you're dreaming. But this is new, strange and wonderful, but also vaguely foreboding. Wield your own personality as cards in a game to overcome your torments and achieve a breakthrough in your psychology to break out of the injustices in your waking life.

name: Focus Find
description: Immerse yourself in Focus Find, a gripping narrative thriller game. Solve environmental puzzles through 5 stages of grief, where reality blurs with unexpected revelations. Guide Adam through his lost past, navigating a gripping tale of loss and grief.

name: Death Ring
description: Death Ring is a casual action roguelike in which you will have to force your way through hordes of undead in search of the human world’s main artefact. Numerous scenarios of each character’s development based on random dropping items will make your runs unique.

name: Rich Lands
description: Become the richest person in the land! Operate various vehicles to extract precious resources from the land to produce and sell goods, expand your properties, and grow your business in an unpredictable open world!

name: Galactic Diner
description: Become the best chef in the galaxy! Cook for aliens, make new friends, and go head-to-head against other chefs to win it all in a game show where the customer is always right!

name: All Alone with Mannie
description: All Alone with Mannie is a difficult, quick reflex, survival horror game where your only allies are a flashlight, and a blanket, but be careful how you blink... It could be your downfall.

name: Gelatine
description: Gelatine is an action-oriented sandbox game where you play as an ordinary slime trying to survive and establish a colony of fantastical creatures in a hostile environment.

name: Regulator City
description: Lead a group of tactical trained experts to control the gangs in your city. Use gang-money to buy new buildings for your city, modifying the status quo on the streets!

name: Protect Your Soul
description: Protect Your Soul is a simple arcade inspired game, in which the player has to find a magical portal in order to escape a dark and chaotic realm. This dark realm is filled with monsters trying to kill you and destroy your soul. Your goal is to escape before they do.

name: Duskwitch: Heroic Soul
description: Duskwitch: Heroic Soul is a fast-paced character action shooter where you play as Rutie, a Witch that is tasked with saving the world after nearly ending it herself. Harness the power of the Broom and style your way through the apocalypse as the Duskwitch!

name: Escape Jump
description: Escape Jump is a precision platformer where you and your funny companion jump and fall, rage-quit and fall, flip your table, destroy your computer, put it back together and then you fall.

name: Botty: Paper tales
description: Botty: Paper tales is an atmospheric adventure made entirely of paper. Botty's little robot faces a different illusion to get out of the paper world.

name: Puddink
description: Puddink is a relaxing physics puzzle game in which your goal is to stack blocks of pudding to reach the flag!

name: Bloody Pigs 1996
description: Bloody Pigs a top down roguelike shooter with stunning 3D graphics and procedural generation coming to your home PC soon. The game is so difficult that nobody will ever beat it. It’s made to crush your spirit and taint your soul.

name: The Rewind Factory
description: A software update fails and you end up in a test track. The only way out: complete the test track. You can rewind trough time, wall run, dash and slow time to complete the test chambers as fast a possible. Can you beat the fastest time in this FPS movement based game?

name: We Survive Tonight
description: Survival Horror Roguelite RPG with 1-4 co-op. Hours after the outbreak, you are left stranded in the forest that became your safe-haven. Battle through procedurally generated areas, manage your time wisely as each day passes, build your community and survive!

name: Spellgrimage
description: Spellgrimage is a tactical RPG rogue lite, with gestion part. Choose your heroes, assign them skills, and set out to conquer an adventure full of mystery and danger.

name: Apocalyptic Dream
description: Apocalyptic Dream, or ApoYume for short, is a dual-protagonist otome visual novel set during a zombie outbreak. You play as twins Toshiro and Mikuru Aikyo, intermittently swapping POV.

name: Picka: 30 Days to Love
description:
What if you can experience virtual reality on your way to school or work, before going to bed, or during break time after lunch, just by sending messages?

Come join Picka and experience it yourself with "30 Days to Love", a virtual 30-day dating experiment.

Choose any message you want and create your own story and ending!

name: Infinite Blue
description:
A pinging sound signals a notification on your phone – a chatroom app has been mysteriously downloaded that can’t be uninstalled. You’re not the only one.

You and six strangers, all living near the same city with different backgrounds and lifestyles, come together to try and understand why and how you were chosen to be a part of the app. As the days pass and you become immersed into each other’s lives, it’s not long before these strangers begin to take an interest in you. At the same time, a literal and figurative storm is brewing, and somehow, you’re at the center of it.

As love blossoms and thunderclouds form, your choices will change the course of everyone’s lives forever.

name: EtherOrcs
description: EtherOrcs is a play-to-earn 100% on-chain game and eco-system. Orcs and their Allies go on raids, pillages, journeys, and more.

name: Lumote: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: This edition includes the game and the following: Original Soundtrack. Squish, bop and bounce through the world around you. Lumote is extremely curious, highly inquisitive and adorable!

name: Scaredom
description: Scaredom is a 2D, fast-paced action-adventure platformer where you play as a Nightmare going to war against the army of Dreams. Explore surreal worlds, meet bizarre, fearsome characters and use your Nightmare powers to ruthlessly slaughter your enemies.

name: Gems of Magic: Dwarf's Destiny
description: Embark on an enchanting adventure to find your destiny by rebuilding the forest village and fend off the goblins in this exciting Match 3 adventure!

name: Car Parking Simulator
description: Drift and Park in Amazing Cars! Maneuver long Buses and make Freight Truck Deliveries! Show your Parking and Driving Skills in 50 Epic Missions at the Multi-Level Parking Lot!

name: War Mines Collection
description: The Allies need your help!

name: Amazin' George Remastered
description: Guide George home through a expansive maze world with fun abilities, tricks and challenges along the way! George is a fun game for all ages. Do you have what it takes to escape the maze?

name: Injection π 23: No Name, No Number - Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Injection π 23: No Name, No Number - Expansion Events
description: Sin descripción

name: Monster Toons
description: Monster Toons crashes onto the scene with a monster invasion. These mischievous marauders may be cute, but they're also destructive! Calm down the charming creatures before they turn Multland upside-down. Match your way to success with 100 unique Match 3 levels illustrated in a charming cartoon style. Enter the colorful world of Monster Toons today!

name: Ripit Hook
description: Custom Data East (92) Hook Pinball game.

name: Elementals: Calm Skies
description: Elementals: Calm Skies is a fast turn-based dungeon crawling game.

name: Times Table Hunt
description: A funny game for kids to learn and practice the times tables

name: Little Astronaut
description: A little astronaut in a huge danger. You are Sky, an engineer of the SBTC Science Bio Technology Corporation. You have one mission: explore what happened at the Mars Bioresearch Facility where all the communication was lost. You are only a little astronaut, but what you will find, is a huge danger.

name: Breaker's World
description: Upgrade your power armor, recruit a loyal crew, and build a spaceship to escape the oppressive management of a dystopian barren planet. Breaker's world features open-ended sci-fi RPG character development in a unique world full of rust, danger, and opportunity.

name: Out of Sight
description: Your ship has been hi-jacked by a clever and aggressive alien space cult. Observe the enemy's behaviour and outwit them using stealth tactics and hi-tech gadgets. Plan your escape with a friend in co-op in this 2D top-down action-stealth game.

name: Championship Wrestling Promoter
description: Book shows, build feuds, manage your finances, and win the TV ratings war in Championship Wrestling Promoter, a professional wrestling management strategy game.

name: The Detroit After
description: You are a robot, you have to kill everyone...

name: Bounters
description: Bounters is a multiplayer looter shooter game. Setup your loadout, fight, loot, take bounties, and exit the field to claim all loots and bounties you got!

name: What Lies Between
description: Transported to a new world, jump and dash your way across the strange land to return home!

name: Base Jump: Wing Suit Flying
description: Spread your wings and start flying like you’ve never been before! Base Jump Wing Suit Flying allows you to take part in awesome and exciting extreme sports. Use Wingsuit to jump and fly over multiple cool environments and beat your high scores!

name: Landing Hero: Haneda x 787
description: The stage is Haneda Airport, the largest airport in Japan and gateway to the sky. You are the pilot of the 787 and you are about to finish a long flight, your mission is to control and land the plane safely.

name: Fly Cat
description: A cute kitty, platformer game!

name: Ghost Haunt
description:
Ghost Haunt is a thrilling multiplayer horror game that pits players together as the Ghost Hunter or the Ghost or against the AI. Four brave Ghost Hunters face off against one cunning Ghost in a chilling battle for survival to capture them all! and learn from them.

The Ghost Hunters are equipped with an arsenal of paranormal equipment to track, identify, and banish the spectral adversary. They must work together, using communication and strategy to survive the haunting. The team's ultimate goal is to capture enough evidence to banish the Ghost before time runs out.

The Ghost, on the other hand, is a master of terror. Using a variety of supernatural abilities, the Ghost must terrorize and eliminate the Ghost Hunters one by one. The Ghost can possess objects, manipulate the environment, and even directly attack the Hunters. Victory for the Ghost means driving the Hunters to insanity or eliminating them all.

name: Post Solis
description: Post Solis is a real-time sci-fi strategy game. Your only ally is a tiny ray of the sunlight. It moves across the planet, and you can only build in its area. Anything plunged into darkness is destroyed. The game is built around the key mechanics of following the slipping ray of light.

name: Travel to GolemPark
description: A classic adventure quest, in the setting of an alternative future. Help the main character gather friends and go on a trip to the festival.

name: Nuwe: First seeds
description: Adventure game with a spectacular design and innovative 2D, 3D platform mechanics. Located in a beautiful universe full of incredible creatures and landscapes.

name: Meteor Blasters
description: Meteor Blasters is a non-stop action space shooter. Inspired by Asteroids, this game will see you choose between 6 different ships each with their own characteristics and utilize a variety of weapon powerups to eradicate the space rocks. Play 4 players Co-op or Versus Mode with friends.

name: The Dark Defender
description: The Dark Defender is a story driven adventure game where you play as a character who has been deserted, with no recollection of your past. With determination you make your way through a world with many friends to assist you on your journey, as well as enemies burdening your adventure.

name: The Asmodian Princesses and the Witch in the Forest
description: One day, Shoichi heard the call from a mysterious goddess. "Please come and take down the devil!" Although it sounds like a template, he still came to the "demon world". After meeting the two princesses and the king, he was made to make an "ultimate choice", and the legend of this young man began.

name: Park After Dark
description:
Park After Dark is is an erotic parody game created as a hobby by fans for fans

When you are granted a magic pen with the ability to rewrite reality, you immediately begin creating your very own theme park...and filling it with sexy princesses!
Manage your time between visiting the girls and growing your park!

name: SDI
description: SDI is an LCD game released by Sega in Japan as part of the Game Vision series. Though Sega intended for linked with the arcade game SDI, it is in fact a retooled version of Tiger Electronics' 1989 LCD "Super Sound" handheld, Space Fight (not to be confused with an earlier handheld from the company with the same name).

name: OutRun F-1
description: OutRun F-1 is an LCD game released by Sega in Japan as part of the Game Vision series. Though Sega intended for it to be tied with their OutRun franchise, it is in fact a retooled version of Tiger Electronics' 1989 LCD "Super Sound" handheld, Road Race.

name: LSI Table Stadium Baseball
description: LSI Table Stadium Baseball is a LCD interpretation of baseball.

name: Tassilo's Quest
description: Tassilo's Quest is a 2D platformer developed by Tassilo59 and co-developed by Daxternator_2117. Inspired by classic platformers such as Mario and Sonic, Tassilo's Quest involves you running, swimming (and sometimes flying) through various locales, collecting crystals based of the 7 magical powers, and taking the fight to King Tutti Frutti's Moon Base to stop him once and for all and save the land.

name: PuffPals: Island Skies
description: A wholesome life simulator game where you can collect, farm, customize and explore new lands with cute and fluffy PuffPals!

name: Temple of Boonil
description: Temple of Boonil is an abstract first person puzzle game with a unique striking retro visual style. Use lights and colors to clear obstacles and explore an ancient temple along with its forgotten history.

name: Setback
description: Setback is a fast-paced arena shooter and a new take on the traditional FPS. The core mechanic, “setbacking”, replaces death with a rewind through time and space.

name: Super Mario Outbreak
description: A new virus has allegedly spread throughout the Mushroom World, and Bowser's minions are enforcing strict stay-at-home orders to prevent its further spread. Mario, knowing Bowser's history of evil deeds, is suspicious, so he violates the orders to investigate.

name: Narcotics Ninja
description: Narcotics Ninja is a fast paced action platformer with an emphasis on physics based platforming and high intensity combat.

name: Starlight Attack
description: Starlight Attack is a 2D hand-animated space shooter styled like a classic arcade game. Fly through space and fight off all sorts of aliens, robots and monsters in a race to save your home planet, Starlight, which has been shrunk and stolen with everyone still on it!

name: Soot
description: Soot is a Simulation and Strategy game where you control the terraforming crew of the Ziggurat, a roaming space station that orbits small planets and exploits their resources. Follow Captain Christopher Mason and Lieutenant Ferdinand McCann as they (and you) master the craft of terraforming.

name: AllBoomGame
description:
AllBoomGame is a free mobile battle royale.

Fun battles1vs1 and survival mode for mobile devices.

There are different maps and leagues that, depending on the games, each player will get. Use all the weapons you find on the map to eliminate your opponents.

CHOOSE YOUR PREFERRED GAME MODE:

- Ranked: is a ranking type game mode that works with leagues. To climb the leagues and discover the different maps in the game, you can get pixels killing your opponents.

- Free: it is a type of combat against a single opponent. There is no classification.

COLLECT ALL SKINS:

Make your character different from the rest! Get all the skins in the game and combine them in a fun way.
There are two ways to get the skins: with Gems or Amokens.

DISCOVER ALL SKILLS:

In each game there are 1 or 2 keys that are randomly held by a player. The player in question who has the key can get it when he finds the portal that will be open for a limited time. At any time, the other opponents can fight to get their opponent's key. The keys obtained will allow us to buy skills.

name: South Park
description: South Park was a cancelled puzzle-platformer in which you must rescue Kenny in each level using Stan, Kyle, and Cartman using their unique attributes.

name: Magyarock VR
description: Magyarock VR is a drumming rhythm game where you can discover Hungarian metal / rock bands while you are climbing to the top of the leaderboards. Be part of the community and help make the game better.

name: Dismay
description:
You play as a detective, who is investigating an abandoned mansion. Discover clues, solve complex and unique puzzles and uncover the mysteries of the mansion. You must survive while being chased by a nearly invincible monster hiding in the shadows. Use your environment to hide the thing trying to kill you, and slow them down.
The game is set inside a small abandoned mansion within a nearly endless forest. Explore the mansion and its surroundings to solve the mystery and discover what happened to the missing people. As you wander the lonely corridors and explore every inch of the mansion, you will learn about the mansion's dark secrets and uncover the fates of the missing souls.

name: Koopa Troopa Forest
description: Koopa Troopa Forest is an unreleased Mario game that was made to showcase how the pointer controls for the Wii would work. The game's existence was unknown until July 2021, when documents about the development of the Wii were leaked as a part of the Gigaleaks.

name: Homeworld 3: Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Greed Crystal
description: Sin descripción

name: The Legend of Peach
description:
The Legend of Peach is a mod of The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time that intends to translate the Super Mario 64 stages in the Ocarina of Time engine and Zelda mechanics.
The creator gave up on its development after releasing the first demo.

name: Quiz Realm
description: Quizrealm is a new possibility for streamers to interact with their chat. It offers different types of quizzes. The question sets are split into different categories (General, Food, Sports, etc.). We constantly work on providing more questions for the game on top of user defind questions. Right now we provide 2 sets with a total of 400 questions. Depending on the quiz type the streamer duels against his chat or other streamers.

name: Galaxy Fight Club
description:
Galaxy Fight Club is a fast-paced 3v3 multiplayer and battle royale game made to play with friends. You can choose from a number of our heroes and equip them with the best weapons to take part in our tournaments.
Unlock and level up your heroes, win key fragments from battles to open loot boxes to obtain weapons and armour to get stronger.

name: Morse
description:
Break the bitter attrition of the Great War using timing, tactics and telecommunications in Morse.

Before, you relayed messages. Now you're calling the shots. Send co-ordinates for artillery strikes to cut off supply chains, batter trenches and shred recon planes. Between missions, wander the grounds of the manor and get to know the other staff.

name: Angela Knife
description: Sin descripción

name: Shooter League: Robot Goal
description: Robot Goal is a multiplayer first-person shooter with a soccer twist!, score goals with your gun to win! Choose one of many champions with each their own abilities! Use your gun or abilities to attack players! Do very accurate passing! Use your gun for defense and more!

name: Crazy Frog Collectables: Faces
description:
Crazy Frog Collectables Faces is a cancelled Nintendo DS puzzle game developed by Cypron Studios starring Crazy Frog/The Annoying Thing, a CGI-animated character known for music videos featuring him from the mid-2000s.

The game was later reworked into the DSiWare game Crazy Cheebo: Puzzle Party.

name: Laetus.
description: Laetus. is a rapid 2D precision platformer focused on speed and skill. You play as a small yet swift circle racing against the developer for the fastest time. Speed your way through challenging levels and use all aspects of your movement and colour-changing abilities to finish in record time!

name: Grand Theft Auto 64
description: Grand Theft Auto 64 is an unreleased port of Grand Theft Auto for the Nintendo 64 which was cancelled before being revealed to the public.

name: Meme Lordz
description:
Meme Lordz is a NFT based blockchain game powered by the BSC network. A top-down RPG, battle, bind and collect as you journey through a mysterious land powered by the collective thought-forms of humanity.

The Meme Lordz Beta release takes players on a 60+ hour nostalgic, retro journey through Planet Memnon. Players will experience a rich storyline, dynamic combat system, expansive item system & much more!

name: Square Runner
description:
Square Runner is a fast-paced platformer where you try to go back to your home planet with the side effect of saving earth.
Will you return home or will you be stuck on earth forever? Form a squad, explore the unknown Adamian archipelago and fight creatures in Square Runner

name: End Roll: Rewind
description: An in-progress fan game on a speculative prequel for End Roll.

name: Ghostbusters VR
description: Strap on your proton pack and Quest 2 and step into the world of Ghostbusters in immersive virtual reality. Start your Ghostbusters HQ in a new city, San Francisco, and solve a deep mystery across a new chapter in the Ghostbusters universe.

name: Severen
description: An upcoming game featuring interchangeable limbs that allow for new abilities and secret paths to be found.

name: Breeze in the Clouds
description: Become a force of nature in a stylish, combo-fueled 2D action-adventure! Jump, brawl, and command the powers of weather as Breeze, a scrappy and courageous corgi swept away from his regular life to fight pollution in a fantastic world in the clouds where animal forces control the weather.

name: Bomberman Legends
description: Bomberman Legends, also known as Jaguar Bomberman, is an unreleased action-maze video game that was in development by Genetic Fantasia and planned to be published by Atari Corporation for the Atari Jaguar. It was going to be a unique entry in the Bomberman franchise, featuring its own dedicated single-player and multiplayer modes, with the latter having support for up to eight players by using two Team Tap adapters.

name: World War II: Battle combat
description:
Play the cool WW2 weapons game to get real shooter game experience.
If you like war games with world war setting, then you must play this cool game. Incredible graphics, exciting gameplay, lots of historical weapons and armor will give you the opportunity to immerse yourself in the world of heroes.
You can choose between different online action games, such as Team Deathmatch, Deathmatch, Capture Position, Arms Race, Knife Only and even Bomb Mode.
Use different FPS strategies on different maps, be smart and don't forget the tactics aspect.

Through a magical Dice, you will travel to Luxium and encounter the Gyees.
You will come to understand each and everyone of them through this wonderful adventure.
And the choices you make will help them through hard time when they are misunderstood or discriminated against.

name: Camper Van Simulator

name: Gridheart

name: Suite Snake
description: A timed snake runner with a twist, a timer and a way to reduce tail size. Both performed by collecting card suit in different ways. See if you can balance in this endless snake clone!

name: Edrick's Conquest
description: Edrick's Conquest is an isometric open world Action RPG featuring unique gameplay, charming environments & competitive play. Explore Plesmur, a high fantasy world, on your own or with your allies.

name: CellSar
description: A sandbox game about collecting cells, building machines and organs out of cells and keeping them alive.

name: Monica the Story of Far Worlds
description: Stylized 3D platformer with puzzles and traps. The game tells about the adventures of a little girl who got into an unknown world. Help Monica unravel the mysteries of these ancient lands. Solve puzzles, explore the worlds, defeat enemies, and find your way home!

name: Dungeon Adventurer
description: In this dungeon, you have to play a brave man, defeat monsters with barrage shooting to obtain more powerful weapons, and go to the depths of the dungeon.

name: Bomberman Max: Ain Version
description: A limited edition of Bomberman Max: Blue Champion distributed only in Japan. It has all the unlockables without the need of having the other version.

name: Smoking Snakes
description: In Smoking Snakes you are part of the Brazilian Expeditionary Force (B.E.F) fighting Axis in Italian territory during World War II.

name: Edge Run
description: You have to go through an amazing test, the outcome of which will decide your whole future life. However, not everything is as simple as it seems.

name: Suddenly Meow 2
description: In the second part of the fantastical Match3 game, Tim the cat is hungry for more adventure! Lord Devious broke free from the seal of the fairies and now his ominous shadow is threatening the peace of the forest. Help Tim use his meowtastic skills to save the fairies!

name: Japanese Nekosama Escape: The Old Inn
description: A hot spring inn on a land of mythtery my frinds recommended. Back from bath, I found my room completely different!

name: Reversi 32
description: Play Reversi (32 piece style) on the Wii U GamePad against a friend or Bigley.

name: Arena Brutal
description: Shoot lead & blow heads in Arena Brutal, an action shooter that'll put your weapons proficiency to the test! You'll need to manage the uniquely simulated recoil of each gun, keep on top of ammo & avoid getting your face blown off while speeding to the exit for the highest score & the next challenge

name: Planet Omnia
description: Welcome to Planet Omnia! A multiplayer sandbox game with a focus on exploration, secrets and having fun with your friends!

name: I H8 Ur Face
description: Want to slap the sh*t out of someone but don't want to do time for it? Load an image of the poor bastard on to the dummy and release your rage!

name: SpaceSlog
description:
Slog through space in SpaceSlog. A difficult sci-fi spaceship sim with an emphasis on ship building, crew interaction and story development. Inspired by titles such as Rimworld, Starship Theory and X-COM inc Firefly, Battlestar Galactica and Stargate Universe.

Your capital ship has been attacked by an unknown enemy. Several survivors have managed to escape in a small ship, now alone, hungry and lost in space, you must guide them to safety.

name: Crazy Machines 2
description: Crazy Machines 2 for the DS is the sequel to the well-known puzzle and experiment solving game. The professor is back and leaves his lab to travel around the world this time, to build up new experiments to solve for the player. During his travels he reaches places like beautiful beaches, the Great Wall of China and the pyramids of Giza, to name a few.

name: Super Spy Agents 3D
description: Sin descripción

name: Ai-(Onic)
description: Fight your friends as a small robot tank and get an outlet for your emotions by destroying your friend's buildings.

name: Bunnies vs Zombies
description: "You'll wish you had less fun!" Tower Defense, Jokes and serious story, Choose Your Own Adventure, Do What You Want.Punch zombies in their face, set them on fire, run them over with your car... Do What's Fun.Cross Platform Multiplayer + Solo Campaign. Play How You Like.

name: Reversilly
description: Reversilly is a new type of real time chaos action game! that combines the familiar game of "Reversi" with real-time action elements.

name: Chester's Revenge
description: Take control of Chester the pig as you avenge your herd and set out to retrieve the Sacred Carrot. Armed only with his trusty hand cannon, Chester must battle his way through Rad Ralph’s lieutenants in an over-the-top style revenge romp to reclaim the Carrot and stop Rad Ralph from world domination.

description: Sin descripción
