name: One Hell of a Week
description: A 18+ Yuri romance Visual Novel taking place in a tropical paradise. Oh, and there's Satan.

name: Honey Homer
description: Hit Homer to reach quota!

name: Animal Crusaders
description: Crusade to distant lands and fight your friends in this chaotic 4 player skill based brawler or play survival alone. Defeat players and AI in order to unlock unique projectiles, weapons, magic, and cosmetics. Use spacing and custom loadouts to defeat your foes in battle.

name: Dastardly
description: A frenetic local multiplayer arena combat game for 1-4 players. Jump, dash, and shoot your way to victory, making use of an array of powerups like shields, cloaks, and jetpacks.

name: Legends of Pindorama
description: In the west of the Holy Lands lies an ancient and unheard place, sailors and soldiers will to explore that intriguing land, with tribes and also scary and heinous animals. The earth of Vera Cruz hides secrets and wealths

name: Jinx & Minx's Tower Escape
description: It's Halloween, and the skeleton Jinx and Minx bunnies are trapped high in an abandoned tower! It's up to you to guide them through spooky corridors, haunted rooms and puzzles, collecting the keys and the candy to get the bunnies out and back together!

name: Date Knight
description: An upcoming comedic visual novel where you're a knight dating other knights in your local area.

name: Battle Hero
description: Sin descripción

name: Vaultbreakers
description: Vaultbreakers is a hardcore top-down PvPvE ARPG that blends epic brawler combat with tense, tactical extraction gameplay. Fight alongside friends —or as a lone wolf— to survive intense, dangerous missions in a dynamic fantasy world. Defeat deadly foes, outsmart rival players, and claim your spoils.

name: Death Drive
description: Death Drive is a deck-building open world survival RPG set in a zombie apocalypse. Combining in-depth turn based combat of card battlers and deck building, open world exploration, skills and character abilities, loot, trading, crafting, managing your caravan and survival all together!

name: Sakura Angels
description: From the creators of Sakura Succubus comes an angelic love comedy!

name: Slayer
description: Slayer is a fast paced combat intensive survive and thrive full throttle experience! Combat waves of enemies and make fast paced decisions to build your power! Get ready to slay hordes of enemies with just a click & swipe!

name: Monster Energy Supercross: The Official Videogame 5 - Legends Pack Vol. 1
description: Relive the excitement of the past with the riders and track contained in the Legends Pack Vol. 1!

name: Evil Genius 2: World Domination - Oceans Campaign
description: Unleash dastardly chaos as a brand new Genius - the ecological mastermind Polar! Along with a frosty new Arctic Lair, story Campaign and an equally chilling Doomsday device.

name: The Valley
description: A fantasy based, RPG with magic, story, potion crafting, puzzles, platforming, story, and more!

name: 3 Days: Ghosts of War
description: In the heart of the Afghan wilderness, amidst the chaos of war, you awaken to the stark reality of your mission: three days to navigate the perilous landscape, uncover hidden truths, and confront the ghosts of the past. 3 Days: Ghosts of War beckons you into a realm where time is your greatest adversary, and every decision carries weight.

name: Macheesmo: The Animated Series - The Game
description: The Classic 1991 Platformer comes to Steam!

name: Star Math: Interstellar Rogue 2
description: Star Math is a sci-fi turn-based strategy game where you use your maths to defeat the enemy! Humanity is fighting a robotic threat from space of its own making! You will fight through a huge 100 area procedural saga map to defeat 9 boss ships, before you can fight the mainframe in the final battle!

name: The Expedition
description: "The Expedition" is a first person open world survival game based on a remote island in the Bermuda Triangle. Try to survive as long as you can. Gather resources to build more and more gear and discover all hidden weapons, treasures and locations.

name: Doom & Destiny Worlds: Fantastic Quests and Where to Find Them
description: Unlock rare and powerful items by helping who is in need. This is the way of the hero. Nothing is done for free!

name: Deliverance
description: Hunt...Craft,,, and survive the wild west. A survival PVP extravaganza! Hunt Others, Craft your own custom bullets and bombs, Search for bosses and level up your outfit to survive the Wild west in this unique western survival game!!

name: The President
description: The President is a management / political simulation game where you play as the president of one of the available countries. Shape your country and meet the expectations of your people to be re-elected in the next elections.

name: 2080 Apocalypse
description: 2080 Apocalypse is a combination of action-adventure, mystery, 3d platforming puzzle game. In this semi-open world, You have must fight with dead robots and bring a master cube. beautiful adventure with dead robots.
